page.title: 16HOMES FOR THE ELDERLY B'BURN
page.content: The elderly in our Domesday Project Zone of Blackburn live in widely differing environments. 1} Local Authority Category 1. These people live by themselves and are capable of living independent lives. They are visited by relatives or friends. 2} We also met people who live with heir families. 3} L.A. Category 2. We visited two types of sheltered housing.One was a private charity with flats.They were well furnished with a warden on duty connected by intercom.The residents cooked for themselves but could choose to receive "meals on wheels" three times a week. A laundry room was available and refuse rooms on every floor and a lift.There was also a communal sitting room.All medical facilities are available.
